channel.title: How could i make a (Connectedfrom) folder ? (Read More) plz
channel.description: Hey i was wondering how i could get the connectedfrom folder so when someone joins the server i could see what the person's ip was because if they are multi-login then i want to see if it's true for proof. please help me thanks.
